evidence.claim: QuikMedic utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and scaling capabilities.
The company processes healthcare transactions compliant with HIPAA regulations.
QuikMedic leverages FHIR standards for patient information exchange.
Use of HL7 to integrate with existing healthcare systems.
The integration with Twilio API for secure communication with patients.

icp.icp_reason: QuikMedic operates in healthcare and uses X12 standards, indicating a need for API automation in claims and eligibility.
